name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 11, when the second trial of Xu Shuangjun's gang-related case opened, the judge attempted to conduct the trial without the defense lawyers. Lawyers Yang Xiao and Wang Xingwei were not allowed to enter the court. They could only enter the court during the recess and asked the judge to immediately stop this illegal trial. The judge decided to adjourn the court immediately after seeing the two. The bailiffs forced to turn off all power supplies, calling it a power outage maintenance. The lawyers waiting to argue with the judge used their mobile phones to illuminate the court in the Hebi Intermediate Court.
On the morning of November 14, the court resumed, and the two were again turned away. When filming and describing the process of being deprived of the right to defend, lawyer Wang Xingwei was controlled by the bailiffs and was also pretended to fall and hit by the bailiffs. He was taken to the police station and was released in the evening.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Xinhua News Agency investigates journalists being beaten. On November 14, Xinhua News Agency newspaper Economic Information Daily reporters Wang Wenzhi and Cheng Zilong were beaten and their cell phones were snatched while interviewing at the construction site of China Railway Seventh Bureau of Hefei-Xinyi High-speed Railway in Anhui. The on-site video shows that a person in charge at the scene said to the camera that he had seized the reporter's cell phone, and the beating of the reporter might also be done by his subordinates. When faced with the reporter's question "Can we leave?" the person in charge said, "I have arrested the person (reporter), I have arrested the scene, can I let you go?"
It is understood that on November 12, the Economic Information Daily published an investigative report "Elastic cushion layer "opens as soon as it is cut", Hefei-Xinyi Railway construction materials "substituting inferior materials for good materials" pose safety hazards", revealing that many construction units of the Hefei-Xinyi Railway (Hefei to Xinyi) illegally replaced the "EPDM elastic cushion layer" with "recycled rubber imitations" that did not meet the railway industry standards in order to save costs...
fullContent:
新华社调查记者被打。11月14日，新华社报刊《经济参考报》的记者王文志、程子龙在安徽合新高铁中铁七局施工现场采访时被打，手机被抢夺。现场视频显示，一位现场的负责人对着镜头称，记者手机是他扣的，殴打记者可能也是他的下属干的。而面对记者质问“我们可以走了吗？”该负责人则称，“我逮到人（记者）了，我逮到现场了，我能让你走吗？”
据了解，11月12日，《经济参考报》刊发调查报道《弹性垫层“一割就开”，合新铁路建设材料“以次充好”存安全隐患》一文，揭露了合新铁路（合肥至新沂）多家施工单位为节省成本，以次充好，违规将“三元乙丙橡胶弹性垫层”偷换为不符合铁路行业标准的“再生胶仿制品”，这些仿冒品性能远低于设计要求，存在安全隐患。
对此，中铁七局回应称，将配合警方调查。
